titles.title: Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.
Providing for a joint session of Congress to receive a message from the President.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

vote.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 912, H. Con. Res. 69 is considered passed House.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution provides for a joint session of Congress on March 1, 2022, to receive a message from the President.
